languages.text: "Пойми, эттфатер, беседа сия важна. Так ведет моя охотничья тропа, и мы можем либо пройти по ней вместе, либо дальше я пойду один. Надеюсь, ты прислушаешься ко мне, ибо я не желаю оставлять твою дружину прежде, чем отплачу за спасение из плена ксеносов".

"Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."
languages.original_text: "Пойми, эттфатер, беседа сия важна. Так ведет моя охотничья тропа, и мы можем либо пройти по ней вместе, либо дальше я пойду один. Надеюсь, ты прислушаешься ко мне, ибо я не желаю оставлять твою дружину прежде, чем отплачу за спасение из плена ксеносов".

traits.locale_text: "Understand, Aett-vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I will walk it alone. I hope you will heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."

"Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."

languages.text: “你要明白这场谈话有多么重要，狼领。这是我的狩猎之路，我们可以一起前进，但如果你不愿意与我同行，我也可以一个人走。我希望你能留意我的话，因为是你把我从异形的奴役中救了出来，我并不想在还清你的人情之前，就不得不离开你的战团。”
languages.original_text: "Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."

traits.locale_text: “你要明白这场谈话有多么重要，狼领。这是我的狩猎之路，我们可以一起前进，但如果你不愿意与我同行，我也可以一个人走。我希望你能留意我的话，因为是你把我从异形的奴役中救了出来，我并不想在还清你的人情之前，就不得不离开你的战团。”

languages.text: « Vous devez comprendre l'importance de cette conversation, aett-vater. Nous pouvons partir en chasse côte à côte, ou j'emprunterai seul le sentier de ma destinée. J'espère que vous tiendrez compte de mes paroles, car je ne souhaite pas abandonner votre clan avant de rembourser la dette que j'ai envers vous pour m'avoir libéré du joug des xénos. »
languages.original_text: "Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."

traits.locale_text: « Vous devez comprendre l'importance de cette conversation, aett-vater. Nous pouvons partir en chasse côte à côte, ou j'emprunterai seul le sentier de ma destinée. J'espère que vous tiendrez compte de mes paroles, car je ne souhaite pas abandonner votre clan avant de rembourser la dette que j'ai envers vous pour m'avoir libéré du joug des xénos. »

languages.text: «Entienda la importancia de esta conversación, Aett-Vater. Es mi senda de caza, y podemos recorrerla juntos o lo haré solo. Espero que considere mi petición, pues no pienso abandonar su equipo hasta saldar mi deuda por haberme liberado de ser esclavo de los xenos».
languages.original_text: "Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."

traits.locale_text: «Entienda la importancia de esta conversación, Aett-Vater. Es mi senda de caza, y podemos recorrerla juntos o lo haré solo. Espero que considere mi petición, pues no pienso abandonar su equipo hasta saldar mi deuda por haberme liberado de ser esclavo de los xenos».

languages.text: 「この会話がいかに重要かわかってくれ、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺の狩猟の道だ。共に徘徊するか、俺一人で歩くか。俺の言葉に耳を傾けてほしい。異種族の支配から解放された借りを返す前に、お前の軍団を見捨てたくはないんだ」
languages.original_text: "Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."

traits.locale_text: 「この会話がいかに重要かわかってくれ、アエット＝ヴァテル。俺の狩猟の道だ。共に徘徊するか、俺一人で歩くか。俺の言葉に耳を傾けてほしい。異種族の支配から解放された借りを返す前に、お前の軍団を見捨てたくはないんだ」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst verstehen, Aettvater, wie wichtig diese Unterhaltung ist. Das ist meine Jagd und entweder gehen wir zusammen auf die Pirsch oder ich ziehe alleine los. Ich hoffe, ihr macht, was ich sage, denn ich will Eure Kriegsschar nicht verlassen, bevor ich meine Schuld für die Rettung von der Xenos-Knechtschaft nicht beglichen habe."
languages.original_text: "Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst verstehen, Aettvater, wie wichtig diese Unterhaltung ist. Das ist meine Jagd und entweder gehen wir zusammen auf die Pirsch oder ich ziehe alleine los. Ich hoffe, ihr macht, was ich sage, denn ich will Eure Kriegsschar nicht verlassen, bevor ich meine Schuld für die Rettung von der Xenos-Knechtschaft nicht beglichen habe."

languages.text: "Bu görüşmenin ehemmiyetini iyi anlayasın Aett-Vater. Ava giden bu yol, benim yolum. Ya onu beraber yürürüz ya da bir başıma geçerim. Sözlerime kulak veresin. Zenoların bana vurduğu zincirleri kırdın, diyetini ödemeden savaşçılarını terk eylemek istemem."
languages.original_text: "Understand, Aett-Vater, how important this conversation is. It is my hunting path, and we can either prowl together, or I shall walk it alone. I hope you heed my words, for I do not wish to abandon your warband before my debt for being freed from the xenos thraldom is repaid."
